metadata.title: CVE-2016-2820 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The Firefox Health Reports (aka FHR or about:healthreport) feature inMozilla Firefox before 46.0 does not properly restrict the origin ofevents, which makes it easier for remote attackers to modify sharingpreferences by leveraging access to the remote-report IFRAME element.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2820` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-globalmenu - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
firefox-testsuite - 46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '46.0+build5-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
